title: Drawing, "Radio City Music Hall: Pair of Night Tables", October 18, 1932
medium: Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 201/Olsson/Oct.-18-32; above stamp in graphite: NIGHT TABLE ON LEFT SIDE/WITH DOOR; lower left corner in graphite, above perspective drawing: NIGHT TABLE ON RIGHT SIDE/OPEN WITH DRAWER; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of a pair of night tables. Left night table in macassar ebony, rounded bottom left corner, base in dark material. Cabinet door on front of night table with rounded aluminum pull at upper center. Right night table in macassar ebony with rounded bottom right corner, base in dark material. Drawer near top with rounded aluminum pull at center; two open shelves below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Radio City Music Hall: Pair of Night Tables", October 18, 1932.
October 18, 1932. Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-783.
